name: javascript-style
description: A reasonable approach to JavaScript extending Airbnb's config.

scripts.preinstall: npm run install:config && npm run install:config:base
scripts.install:config: cd packages/eslint-config-jackfletch && npm prune && npm install
scripts.install:config:base: cd packages/eslint-config-jackfletch-base && npm prune && npm install
scripts.test: npm run --silent test:config && npm run --silent test:config:base

author: Jack Fletcher
